nodes.text: Berric lived on the planet Coruscant and served as a police officer with the Coruscant Security Force. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic the Sith Empire, he supplied his fellow officers with weapons from a small shop near the taxi station in Black Sun territory.
Berric was a large, Human male with brown, balding hair, brown eyes and he had fair skin. Berric wore a Coruscant Security Force uniform and carried a large blaster rifle.
Berric appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a weapons vendor on Coruscant.
